page.title: 05HOME LIFE FOOD MARKFIELD
page.content: Every morning in our house I get my own breakfast. It is one small bowl of cornflakes and a drink of orange juice.I have sandwiches at school. I make my own normally.I have 1 or 2 cobs with cheese in the middle and my other brothers and sisters make their own too.My dad has a sandwich too because my mum is in bed as she works as a night nurse.On Friday nights my dad prepares a Chilli con Carne and some mashed potatoes.When we have finished there is a rota to see who does the washing up.On Sundays we all have mashed potatoes,vegetables and Yorkshire pudding and beef.For pudding we have fruit crumble or rice pudding.When we have finished my older brother and sister wash up.For tea we have salad and different kinds of cold meats with jelly and ice cream for afters.
